Author: nosleeptill8
Text: Lots of water, no more purging, put a cold washcloth or an ice pack over your face, wear your hair down. Itâ€™ll be ok.

Author: ISBbaby
Text: Drink lots and lots of water, and try to remember that ultimately, everyone is focused on the bride and groom! If push comes to shove, a diuretic could be useful, but I can't really recommend that with a totally clear conscience.
